trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Sellersburg
There were no other sightings in Sellersburg on or around February 13th 2009
Summary: Highly reflective dual-lobed orb rotates, hovers and blinks out.
divs: sighting details i was driving to the local college campus, and i was running a little late... class starts at 5:30, it was between 5:20-5:25 and i was on the main street that runs down the center of town. at the streetlight just before crossing under hwy 65, i was waiting at the light when i noticed a highly reflective spherical object. the sun reflecting off this object is what drew my attention to it, it was much more reflective than the jets that fly over continuously. i immediately knew it wasn't a typical aircraft. it was moving very slowly and it appeared to be golden\silver in color. at this point the light had changed and i proceeded to drive to the campus while trying to stay visually locked on this thing. i observed it slowly rotate, that's when i noticed it was a double orb. it first appeared to me in the eastern sky and it slowly moved to the northeast, i lost it in the glare of the sun.
